helpText: 試_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________驗.

generic.title: 試_Error updating categories__________________________驗
generic.message: 試_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________驗.

maxDepthExceeded.title: 試_Error updating categories__________________________驗
maxDepthExceeded.message: 試_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________驗.

destinationHasSameName.title: 試_Error updating categories__________________________驗
destinationHasSameName.message: 試_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________驗.

emptyTitle.title: 試_Error updating categories__________________________驗
emptyTitle.message: 試_Category title cannot be empty_________________驗.

noSchema.title: 試_Schema not found_________________驗
noSchema.message: 試_Item schema not found for user_________________驗.

maxCharacter.title: 試_Error updating categories__________________________驗
maxCharacter.message: 試_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________驗.

deleteInUseCategory.title: 試_Delete category________________驗
deleteInUseCategory.message: 試_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________驗.

custom.title: 試_Custom categories__________________驗
custom.message: 試_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________驗.

arcgis.title: 試_ArcGIS categories__________________驗
arcgis.message: 試_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________驗.

iso.title: 試_ISO categories_______________驗
iso.message: 試_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________驗.

inspire.title: 試_INSPIRE categories___________________驗
inspire.message: 試_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________驗.
